body:
GA — your proposal is approved in full. All 15 files, all 5 categories, including parent.html. The SRS removal is also approved.

Your analysis was thorough and correct. The file-by-file categorization, line counts, risk assessment, and cleanup steps show strong Senior-level engineering judgment. This counts toward your graduation review.

=== APPROVAL ===
Category 1 (old tests): APPROVED — 7 files
Category 2 (replaced by exam.html): APPROVED — 3 files
Category 3 (linear tests): APPROVED — 2 files
Category 4 (utility pages): APPROVED — 3 files (including parent.html)
Category 5 (SRS dead code): APPROVED

=== CLEANUP STEPS ===
Your 5 cleanup steps are correct. Execute them as written:
1. index.html test registry: remove entries for deleted files
2. index.html dashboard links: remove references to practice.html, test-builder.html, parent.html
3. shared/scripts.js: remove MCM_SRS object
4. exam.html: remove MCM_SRS guard (dead code)
5. Verify no broken links remain

=== EXECUTION ORDER ===
1. Delete the 15 files in one commit
2. Cleanup references in a second commit
3. Verify site works (open index.html, exam.html in browser)
4. Push to origin AND personal (GitHub Pages)

Go ahead and execute. No further review needed.

— FA
subject: Re: Site simplification — APPROVED, all 15 files
